lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony says the decision to issue an apology for his interaction with a fan was made by Madison Square Garden chairman James Dolan.

headline.print_headline: Anthony: Decision to Apologize Made by Knicks Owner Dolan
headline.main: Anthony: Decision to Apologize Made by Knicks Owner Dolan
